item.title: The confirm option
item.description: This is probably one of my favorite option in VIM. Just add this to your .vimrc: set confirm This will affect different command in VIM: instead of just failing (and telling you to use force if you want to overwrite), it’ll show a confirm “popup” at the bottom and you’ll be good to do.
